scripts.lint: pnpm exec biome check apps docs scripts
scripts.test: pnpm run test:remote && pnpm run test:tmux && node tests/e2e/telemetry.spec.mjs
scripts.docs:dev: pnpm --dir site install --shamefully-hoist && pnpm --dir site run dev
scripts.docs:build: pnpm --dir site install --shamefully-hoist && pnpm --dir site run build
